item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
item.description: Variation Visualizations Categorical Variable â€“ Bar chart with geom_bar Continuous Variable Typical values Unusual Values Zoom in into plot without resetting xlim and ylim with coord_cartesian Missing Values Rowwise Deletion vs Replacing with NAs Suppressing ggplot2 NAs removal warnings with na.rm = TRUE Comparing missing vs non-missing values by creating new variable using is.na() Covariation A Categorical and Continuous Variable Density Plot with geom_freqpoly Large Dataset Small Dataset Two Categorical Variables Bubble Chart with geom_count Heatmap Plotting with geom_tile Two Continuous Variables Scatterplot using geom_point Large dataset problems and solutions Patterns and Models ** This post is heavily based on R for Data Science.
